page.title: 19The Rector Of Maresfield
page.content: Mr Geoffrey W.R Berry is the{rector } for{Maresfield}but he lives at Nutley in the rectory. He has a wife and she helps him a lot.Mr Berry starts work at 8.3o am and finishes at 1o.oo pm. He has two helpers to help him. No one has had to take his place for illness or holidays.The helpers are retired people.Mr Berry works in two{churches} {Nutley Church,St James the Less and {Maresfield Church,St Bartholomews}He takes the Sunday services.He has a family service and communion and evensong. He performs marriage services on Saturdays and sometimes christenings and funerals.Mr Berry has been a minister for about 25 years.He enjoys his work very much he also goes to Maresfield and Nutley schools to talk to the children. By Emma and Zoe.
